about_the_game:
Cubed and Dangerous is a charming but punishing action looter shooter that seamlessly merges elements of action RPG build-crafting with the thrill of perma-death roguelike gameplay. Test your skills against this ever escalating challenge set in a stylized procedurally-generated world filled with enemies, bosses, rare items, game-warping perks and more.

ENDLESS VAULT OF GAMEPLAY

With hundreds of items, procedural upgrades, and emergent enemy behaviors, no two runs will ever be the same. Build up your knowledge of the game's surprisingly deep systems and unlock upgrades, new characters, and more. Even after you’ve defeated the final boss, you can test your build against the Infinite Desert, or push the boundaries with challenge modes and other surprises.

PLAY YOUR WAY

Items have been meticulously crafted to offer a wide variety of play styles and build options. Coupled with the procedural warping of weapon behaviors, you are free to attack the challenges using any strategy you wish. Maybe you're looking to push your comfort zone and trade your long range precision weapons for close range damage; or try using alternate resource forms for some of the heavier special weapons. The physics based interactions and behaviors provide the perfect emergent sandbox for bullet-hell mayhem.

FEATURES

- Procedurally generated worlds, levels and items with infinite combinations
- Difficult and intensely rewarding bullet-hell action
- Deep build-crafting options for endless replayability
- Charming and stylized presentation with vibrant colors and gameplay
- Secrets and much more to discover
